Gra jest świetna, a te czasopisma i serwisy, które nie dały HL2 maksymalnych not, będą żałować tego do końca swoich dni :). Sporo txtów o tej grze zawierało jakieś brednie na temat minusów, jednakże przy plusach są one niedostrzegalne. Po ukończeniu gry mogę szczerze powiedzieć, że : gra w każdym momencie zaskakuje, a już maksymalnie mnie zaskoczyło zakończenie. WYPAS! Każda misja, każda plansza to odmienna, wspaniała gra!
Great game with good physics and gameplay.

Half-Life 2, продолжение легендарной первой части. Выйдя в 2004 году и посей день является одной из лучших игр своего жанра. Каждый уважающий себя геймер обязан пройти данный шедевр. Valve постарались взять всё наилучшее из первой части, приправить новой улучшенной физикой легендарного Source и получили * не побоюсь этого слова * одну из лучших своих игр. Приобретая её вы получаете не только хороших сюжет, но хорошую графику. Желаю каждому пройти эту легендарную игру.

After playing this before on the 360 years ago as part of the orange box, and now revisiting on PC since then, I'm happy to say that Half Life 2 gameplay-wise still holds up well today. I managed to snag the entire series and a little more on sale in the Valve complete pack. If you're looking for some decent fps gameplay on PC, this is a good game to pick up. Very good series too.

If you're seeing this or any of the bundles on sale for cheap, DON'T HESITATE. It's worth it.

I have heard for years about just how good Half-Life 2 is. Years ago I played the demo that ends right before you get your first weapon, and was unsure. I pulled the trigger, and definitely do not regret it. The only problem I have with the game is that there are several places where you have to interact with things like valves, and switches, that have no indication you can use them. Other than that minor problem Half-Life 2 is amazing, I'm currently in Chapter 5, and I am looking forward to going back, and playing the three games before this one (Half-Life, Half-Life Blue Shift, and Half-Life Opposing Force.)

Continuing from the story of Half-Life, twenty years into the future, an interdimensional alien race has taken over and enslaved all man. Your task, as the One Free Man, is to lead the Resistance in overthrowing the Combine and restoring freedom.

Like the original Half-Life, it's an adventure first person shooter game where you play as a physicist who somehow got tasked with handling firearms and explosives.
Key gameplay differences from HL1 being that Shift is used to sprint instead of slow down (at the expense of constantly-recharging auxiliary power), and a lot fewer weapons — playing with the gluon gun and tau cannon was fun while it lasted but having too many weapons at your person can get overwhelming (like, which one do I use!). You also have an ally, Alyx Vance, assisting you on your quest.

Fantastic story, gameplay, and voice acting. Music varies from lowkey ambient tracks to atmospheric to upbeat battle themes, though a number of them have been reused from HL1.

One thing I disliked about HL1 is the sheer difficulty in getting through some of the later parts of the game. It also gets confusing sometimes knowing where to go. Good thing is, this is largely taken out in HL2 and thus it feels a whole lot more fun to play, especially from someone who's not an expert in FPS games. Of course, if it makes it too easy, you have the option to increase the difficulty (but I haven't done that, so I don't know how much more difficult it would be, or if it would be as difficult as HL1).

Anyway, get it if you are into FPS games.

Apres avoir terminer le jeu à de nombreuses reprises je ne peux que conseiller de poursuivre l'aventure dans la peau de steve rogers le captain america du avengers de square enix qui est la suite spirituel de ce chef d'oeuvre. J'ai apprécié l'influence rogue like de ce titre on sent l'amour que porte les développeurs pour les jeux vidéos, aussi j'ai beaucoup apprécier l'easter egg de la triforce au niveau 4 du 2ieme bâtiment.

I like Half Life 2, but i do have a few problems with it. I feel like there aren't as many weapons as HL1. I played for 8 hours before getting the shotgun which I think is kinda stupid. Also the flashlight lags the game, but that's probably because I am running it on a laptop. besides the few problems I have with the game, it's fun.
